column1: Canopy position explains more variation in Rt than does height
There is a negative interactive effect between H and topographic wetness index.
Wood density correlates (positively or negatively) to Rt.
Leaf mass per area correlates positively to Rt.
Ring-porous species have higher Rt than diffuse- or semi-ring- porous.
Percent loss leaf area upon desiccation correlates negatively with Rt.
Water potential at turgor loss correlates negatively with Rt.
